attributes.action: Increase maximum penalty for an adult carrying a knife to 7 years in prison.
attributes.additional_details: Knife crime in the U.K. has risen year on year. Many children's and young adults lives have been cut short from knife crime. The law is too weak allowing a person to get caught carrying a knife without a prison sentence. The law needs to change so that anyone carrying a knife without a police permit serves a minimum of 7 years in prison. New police knife permits should be issued to people who have to legally carry a knife for their work or trade. These knife permits have to be renewed yearly.
attributes.background: Currently the maximum penalty for an adult carrying a knife is 4 years in prison and an unlimited fine. You’ll get a prison sentence if you’re convicted of carrying a knife more than once. Change this offence to 7 years in prison on first offence of carrying a knife.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you want a minimum or maximum sentence.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
